Name: BACKROOMS: APPREHENSION
About the game: Backrooms: Apprehension is a terrifying and immersive multiplayer horror experience with social deduction elements. Players are thrown inside the creepy and seemingly never-ending Backrooms and must complete their objectives and find a way out while one player, controlling the shapeshifting Skin Stealer, must manipulate and eventually kill them all without getting caught. PLAY AS A SCIENTIST As a scientist you must complete your objectives and find an escape, you can team up with other scientist players but be careful, trusting the wrong player could get you killed very fast. PLAY AS THE SKIN STEALER As the Skin Stealer you can consume bodies of dead scientists and disguise as them, use manipulative tactics to kill the scientists one by one.
